title: Start
body:
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<set $needsfood to 0>>
Baker: Hey girls, were you sparring again? Do be careful.
Mia: We won't get into Roundier Haia's school without practicing!
Baker: You have plenty of time for that. You won't be old enough to get in until you're sixteen, anyway.
Renata: If we're good enough, I bet we'll get in sooner!
Baker: Well, I am happy you girls are so driven.
Baker: The rolls are extra fresh this morning. Would you like any?
Both girls: Yeah! They smell so good!
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<moveUp Mia 3 10>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1>>
<<moveDown Mia 3 10>>
Mia: Thanks! See you later!
Baker: Bye! Be careful!
<<enableCollisions Mia>>
<<setHelpPrompt We can't go in there!>>
